lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In a Washington address to an Export-Import Bank sponsored meeting, Ortner said he believed the dollar at current levels was fairly priced against most European currencies, but that the yen is 10 or 15 pct undervalued.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Commenting on Japan, which is running around a 80 billion dlr trade surplus with the United States, Yeutter said "Japan is just not doing the job on the import side."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. trade representative said the Federal Reserve under Chairman Paul Volcker has done its part to improve the trade situation by getting interest rates down.
